verses.text: Make \w a|strong="H5921"\w* song \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w our|strong="H5921"\w* strength: make \w a|strong="H5921"\w* glad cry \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Jacob.
Take up \w the|strong="H0430"\w* melody, playing \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w an|strong="H7321"\w* instrument \w of|strong="H0430"\w* music, even \w on|strong="H0430"\w* corded instruments.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* horn \w be|strong="H5414"\w* sounded \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* time \w of|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* new moon, \w at|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* full moon, \w on|strong="H5973"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* holy feast-day:

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H8628"\w* rule \w for|strong="H3117"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H8628"\w* law \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Jacob.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* gave \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Joseph \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* witness, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* went out over \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt; \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* words \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* strange tongue \w were|strong="H3478"\w* sounding \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* ears.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* weight \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H3045"\w*; \w his|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w free|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* baskets.

\w You|strong="H5493"\w* gave a cry \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w your|strong="H5493"\w* trouble, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* I made \w you|strong="H5493"\w* free; I gave \w you|strong="H5493"\w* an answer \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* secret place \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* thunder; I \w put|strong="H5493"\w* \w you|strong="H5493"\w* \w to|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* test at \w the|strong="H5493"\w* waters \w of|strong="H3709"\w* Meribah. (Selah.)

\w Give|strong="H6030"\w* ear, O \w my|strong="H5921"\w* people, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w give|strong="H6030"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* word, O Israel, if \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* only do \w as|strong="H7121"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* say!

There \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* strange god \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w*; \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w worship|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* any other god.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w who|strong="H0410"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* land \w of|strong="H0410"\w* Egypt: \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* mouth \w be|strong="H1961"\w* open wide, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* food.

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H0776"\w* did \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5927"\w* ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice; Israel \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* nothing \w to|strong="H3068"\w* do \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w me|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w gave|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w* up \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* desires \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* hearts; \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w might|strong="H3478"\w* go after \w their|strong="H8085"\w* evil purposes.
If only \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w* would give ear \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, walking \w in|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* ways!

\w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* quickly overcome \w their|strong="H8085"\w* haters: \w my|strong="H8085"\w* hand \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* turned against \w those|strong="H1980"\w* \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* war \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* haters \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord would \w be|strong="H3027"\w* broken, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* destruction would \w be|strong="H3027"\w* eternal.

\w I|strong="H6256"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H3584"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* best grain \w for|strong="H6256"\w* food; \w you|strong="H8130"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* full \w of|strong="H3068"\w* honey \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* rock.
